title: CRIT LEONA | SO DAMN BROKEN! - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: i thought to myself, what could make an adc even stronger. the answer was simple. stuns. not many adcs have stuns. so i automatically went to leona thinking, okay, so she has 3 stuns and her Q can crit. how in the world can this not br strong.

replies.body: She actually has 2 stuns if you land the centre of your ult on the target, a slow if the target is just outside the centre. Her Zenith blade is a snare.
oh you got me hahah very true i messed that up
